sentences.sContent: Jobs developed an appreciation for typography, the style and arrangement of printed characters.
sentences.sContent_eng: Jobs developed an appreciation for typography, the style and arrangement of printed characters.
sentences.sCn: 乔布斯渐渐喜欢上排印术——打印字符的版面设计与安排。

sentences.sContent: But the term is a catchall for multiple techniques to handle elements like typography, graphics and video.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the term is a catchall for multiple techniques to handle elements like typography, graphics and video.
sentences.sCn: 但是这个术语涵义很广，也指处理排印、图像和视频等元素的多种技术。

sentences.sContent: This is why display cases are rarely found in the world of digital typography, whereas they were once common in letterpress printing.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is why display cases are rarely found in the world of digital typography, whereas they were once common in letterpress printing.
sentences.sCn: 这就是当今数字化排印领域中罕见特排字体的原因，虽然它们在凸版印刷的时代盛行一时。

remMethod.val: typo (印刷工) + graph (写； 图) + y → 排版， 排印

words.tran: 排印错误；排字工；印刷工

trans.tranOther: the work of preparing written material for printing
